name: Trianguluv
description: Trianguluv is an old-shool arcade game placed in universe where even triangles can have feelings!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: x86 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: x86-x64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c
